original_text: When thou comest into thy neighbour's vineyard, then thou mayest eat grapes thy fill at thine own pleasure; but thou shalt not put any in thy vessel.
korean_text: 네 이웃의 포도원에 들어갈 때에는 마음대로 그 포도를 배불리 먹어도 되느니라 그러나 그릇에 담지는 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: When thou comest into thy neighbour's vineyard
then thou mayest eat grapes thy fill
but thou shalt not put any in thy vessel
